69.movie_plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

162.movie_plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from the corruption that Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

164.movie_plot: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

193.movie_plot: 48 hours of intersecting lives and crimes in Los Angeles.

180.movie_name: Back to the Future Part III (1990)

124.movie_plot: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.

146.movie_plot: Wannabe actors become regulars in the stylish neo-lounge scene; Trent teaches his friend Mike the unwritten rules of the scene.

54.movie_plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt lead by a seasoned US Marshall.

32.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

205.movie_plot: Hijackers seize the plane carrying the President of the United States and his family, but he - an ex-soldier - works from hiding to defeat them.

182.movie_name: So I Married an Axe Murderer (1993)
